subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After missing 12 of their first 13 shots, the Knicks’ offense kicked into gear behind Amar’e Stoudemire’s 10-of-10 shooting and ended up with a 39-point margin of victory.
snippet: After missing 12 of their first 13 shots, the Knicks’ offense kicked into gear behind Amar’e Stoudemire’s 10-of-10 shooting and ended up with a 39-point margin of victory.
